titles.title: A resolution condemning the Government of the People's Republic of China for engaging in transnational repression.
A resolution condemning the Government of the People's Republic of China for engaging in transnational repression.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Risch with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and with an amended preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 247.

committee.name: Senate Foreign Relations
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
